name: Pillar of Time
description:
Travel through endless and timeless realm of White Plane. Choose an ability to aid you as you travel from pillar to pillar.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

"What is this place?"

"It so vast but yet it so empty, like a void."

"And yet, never in my life I thought the void would looks this. White."

Then, countless of pillar with hourglass on top appear out of nowhere. The plane started to moved as the edge begin to disintegrate. He have no choice but to run as he afraid of what lies underneath, the great white abyss.

Closer and closer he get to the pillars, the more he see the infinite amount of them. He made a jump to the first pillar, but he doesn't know the pillar won't be so kind to him. The pillar move under his feet as smooth as silk. He lost his control, he didn't expect the pillar will be moving.

"Am I falling?"

.

.

.

"What is this place?"

_______________________________________________________________________________________
